description:
Designed for all-terrain versatility with a focus on full-day comfort and ease of use. Both the shape and the adjustable bindings optimize your stride efficiency and ergonomics without sacrificing traction or the ability to cross any mountainous terrain.

  • Aluminum 360-degree traction frames
  • Updated HyperLink adjustable binding system has an intuitive and fast ratchet system that accommodates a wide range of boot sizes
  • EVA foam cushioned binding cradle eliminates pressure points
  • Ergo Televator heel lifts for greater comfort and efficiency going uphill
  • Accepts MSR Lightning tails to add additional flotation for heavier loads and less supportive snow
  • Low-profile, narrow frames are ideal for women, those with a narrow gait, or for folks looking for the lightest snowshoe possible
name: MSR Lightning Explore Snowshoes - Women's
